I am passionate about user centric design, everywhere from the inital conceptualization of a product to the validation of the deliverables. My experience in development, product management, and my SCRUM Master certification allow me to work very efficiently and effectively with other teams and departments. I have designed single products and product families, and am equally at home as a team member or a team lead. I take pride in my work and I play very well with others. Organizations such as Amazon, Warner Brothers, and the NHL use the products that I have designed, and my interfaces have been used live at the Sundance Film Festival and at Wimbledon.

My other interests include creating LED wearables with Arduino processors, skiing, alternative fuel vehicles, bass guitar, yoga, self-actualization, and conflict resolution.

The portfolio section contains a few recent highlights of my work, and the process section shows the methodology that I've had success with in the past. Feel free to contact me to have a discussion about the needs of your organization and to explore a fit.

Check out my LinkedIn profile!
